answers.answer: This could be anxiety or stress, however I would advise that you get checked out by your physician or at an ER. There are a number of things that can cause chest pain from heart problems to gall bladder problems to just anxiety and stress. You should seek medical advise and care.

I had that happen to me a few times and its scary. I still dont know what causes them but a few people told me that diabetes could be the cause of those symptoms but thats just word of mouth. I would like to hear it from a health proffessional
